title.rendered: Discover Twitter’s Partnership With Google’s Search Functionality- Part-3

content.rendered:
Enhance search by searching via Google

• Another super cool way to search for candidates in Twitter is by doing
a BOOLEAN SEARCH in Google.

• Supposing we want to search for some candidates in CompanyA with Oracle skills in database management domain, we can use Google to search – “site:twitter.com Database management AND CompanyA AND Oracle”.

• We can add “-“ sign to eliminate some elements in our search. For example
“Software Developer” – Java will eliminate the java developers from the search.

• We can even be more search specific if we use OR Boolean function. Ex: Software developer OR Engineer.

Twitter can be turned into a most effective application for sourcing by recruiters because of its useful mechanisms in talent acquisition.
